title: Gumaker Remington files for bankruptcy
text:
Gumaker Remington files for bankruptcy Monday, March 26, 2018 - 00:57 
America's oldest gunmaker, Remington Outdoor, filed for Chapter 11 to carry out a debt-cutting deal with creditors amid mounting public pressure for greater gun control. Fred Katayama reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
America's oldest gunmaker, Remington Outdoor, filed for Chapter 11 to carry out a debt-cutting deal with creditors amid mounting public pressure for greater gun control. Fred Katayama reports.
